title: Fuzzy Match
description: Scores how similar two short texts are, accounting for typos, abbreviations, spelling mistakes, reordering, and paraphrasing.
used_in: Fields configured with FUZZY strategy in field_strategies config
system_message: You score text similarity. Respond ONLY with JSON.
user_message_template:
You MUST score how similar these two short texts are.
Return ONLY a JSON object: {"score": <float 0.0 to 1.0>}

Scoring rules (follow strictly):
- If one text is a standard abbreviation of the other (e.g. "Ltd"/"Limited", "Dr"/"Doctor", "Inc"/"Incorporated", "Corp"/"Corporation", "St"/"Street", "Ave"/"Avenue", "US"/"United States"), they are IDENTICAL. Return exactly {"score": 1.0}.
- If the texts are the same but differ only in case, spacing, or punctuation, return exactly {"score": 1.0}.
- Typos or minor spelling errors: score 0.9–0.99.
- Reordering of equivalent information: score 0.9–1.0.
- Paraphrasing with same meaning: score 0.8–0.95.
- Partially related but different meaning: score 0.3–0.6.
- Completely different meaning: score 0.0–0.3.

Text A: """{text_a}"""
Text B: """{text_b}"""
